item.description: An item that prevents weak wild Pokemon from appearing for 100 steps after its use.
item.name: Repel

item.description: An item that prevents weak wild Pokemon from appearing for 200 steps after its use.
item.name: Super Repel

item.description: An item that prevents weak wild Pokemon from appearing for 250 steps after its use.
item.name: Max Repel

item.description: A black flute made from blown glass. Its melody makes wild Pokemon less likely to appear.
item.name: Black Flute

item.description: A white flute made from blown glass. Its melody makes wild Pokemon more likely to appear.
item.name: White Flute

item.description: A sweet honey with an aroma that attracts wild Pokemon when used in grass, caves or on special trees.
item.name: Honey

item.description: A long, durable rope. Use it to escape instantly from a cave or a dungeon.
item.name: Escape Rope

item.description: A small red shard. It appears to be from some sort of implement made long ago.
item.name: Red Shard

item.description: A small yellow shard. It appears to be from some sort of implement made long ago.
item.name: Yellow Shard

item.description: A small blue shard. It appears to be from some sort of implement made long ago.
item.name: Blue Shard

item.description: A small green shard. It appears to be from some sort of implement made long ago.
item.name: Green Shard

item.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokemon evolve. It is colored orange.
item.name: Fire Stone

item.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokemon evolve. It has a thunderbolt pattern.
item.name: Thunderstone

item.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokemon evolve. It is a clear, light blue.
item.name: Water Stone

item.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokemon evolve. It has a leaf pattern.
item.name: Leaf Stone

item.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokemon evolve. It is as black as the night sky.
item.name: Moon Stone

item.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokemon evolve. It is as red as the sun.
item.name: Sun Stone

item.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokemon evolve. It is as dark as dark can be.
item.name: Dusk Stone

item.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokemon evolve. It sparkles like eyes.
item.name: Dawn Stone

item.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokemon evolve. It shines with a dazzling light.
item.name: Shiny Stone

item.description: A red Apricorn. It assails your nostrils.
item.name: Red Apricorn

item.description: A yellow Apricorn. It has an invigorating scent.
item.name: Ylw Apricorn

item.description: A blue Apricorn. It smells a bit like grass.
item.name: Blu Apricorn

item.description: A green Apricorn. It has a mysterious, aromatic scent.
item.name: Grn Apricorn

item.description: A pink Apricorn. It has a nice, sweet scent.
item.name: Pnk Apricorn

item.description: A white Apricorn. It doesn't smell like anything.
item.name: Wht Apricorn

item.description: A black Apricorn. It has an indescribable scent.
item.name: Blk Apricorn

item.description: A fossil of an ancient Pokemon that lived in the sea. It appears to be part of a seashell.
item.name: Helix Fossil

item.description: A fossil of an ancient Pokemon that lived in the sea. It appears to be part of a shell.
item.name: Dome Fossil

item.description: A piece of amber that contains the genetic material of an ancient Pokemon. It is clear with a reddish tint.
item.name: Old Amber

item.description: A fossil of an ancient Pokemon that lived in the sea. It appears to be part of a plant root.
item.name: Root Fossil

item.description: A fossil of an ancient Pokemon that lived in the sea. It appears to be part of a claw.
item.name: Claw Fossil

item.description: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokemon that lived on the land. It appears to be part of a head.
item.name: Skull Fossil

item.description: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokemon that lived on the land. It appears to be part of a collar.
item.name: Armor Fossil

item.description: A fossil of an ancient Pokemon that lived in the sea in ancient times. It appears to be part of its back.
item.name: Cover Fossil

item.description: A fossil of an ancient Pokemon that flew in the sky in ancient times. It appears to be part of its wing.
item.name: Plume Fossil

item.description: Though this feather is beautiful, it's just a regular feather and has no effect on Pokemon.
item.name: Pretty Wing

item.description: A small and rare mushroom. It is sought after by collectors.
item.name: TinyMushroom

item.description: A large and rare mushroom. It is sought after by collectors.
item.name: Big Mushroom

item.description: A rare mushroom which gives off a nice fragrance. A maniac will buy it for a high price.
item.name: BalmMushroom

item.description: A somewhat-small pearl that sparkles in a pretty silver color. It can be sold cheaply to shops.
item.name: Pearl

item.description: A quite-large pearl that sparkles in a pretty silver color. It can be sold at a high price to shops.
item.name: Big Pearl

item.description: Very large pearls that sparkle in a pretty silver color. A maniac will buy them for a high price.
item.name: Pearl String

item.description: Lovely, red-colored sand with a loose, silky feel. It can be sold at a high price to shops.
item.name: Stardust

item.description: A shard of a pretty gem that sparkles in a red color. It can be sold at a high price to shops.
item.name: Star Piece

item.description: A shard which fell to the ground when a comet approached. A maniac will buy it for a high price.
item.name: Comet Shard

item.description: A nugget of pure gold that gives off a lustrous gleam. It can be sold at a high price to shops.
item.name: Nugget

item.description: A big nugget of pure gold that gives off a lustrous gleam. A maniac will buy it for a high price.
item.name: Big Nugget

item.description: A pretty, heart-shaped scale that is extremely rare. It glows faintly in the colors of the rainbow.
item.name: Heart Scale

item.description: A very tasty tail of something. It sells for a high price.
item.name: Slowpoketail

item.description: A bone that is extremely valuable for Pokemon archaeology. It can be sold for a high price to shops.
item.name: Rare Bone

item.description: A copper coin used in a civilization about 3,000 years ago. A maniac will buy it for a high price.
item.name: Relic Copper

item.description: A silver coin used in a civilization about 3,000 years ago. A maniac will buy it for a high price.
item.name: Relic Silver

item.description: A gold coin used in a civilization about 3,000 years ago. A maniac will buy it for a high price.
item.name: Relic Gold

item.description: A vase made in a civilization about 3,000 years ago. A maniac will buy it for a high price.
item.name: Relic Vase

item.description: A bracelet made in a civilization about 3,000 years ago. A maniac will buy it for a high price.
item.name: Relic Band

item.description: A stone figure made in a civilization about 3,000 years ago. A maniac will buy it for a high price.
item.name: Relic Statue

item.description: A crown made in a civilization about 3,000 years ago. A maniac will buy it for a high price.
item.name: Relic Crown

item.description: A fertilizer to be spread on soft soil in regions where Berries are grown. A maniac will buy it for a high price.
item.name: Growth Mulch

item.description: A fertilizer to be spread on soft soil in regions where Berries are grown. A maniac will buy it for a high price.
item.name: Damp Mulch

item.description: A fertilizer to be spread on soft soil in regions where Berries are grown. A maniac will buy it for a high price.
item.name: Stable Mulch

item.description: A fertilizer to be spread on soft soil in regions where Berries are grown. A maniac will buy it for a high price.
item.name: Gooey Mulch

item.description: Pure salt that can be discovered deep inside the Shoal Cave. A maniac will buy it for a high price.
item.name: Shoal Salt

item.description: A pretty seashell that can be found deep inside the Shoal Cave. A maniac will buy it for a high price.
item.name: Shoal Shell

item.description: A vital item that is needed to keep a stone tower from collapsing. Voices can be heard from it occasionally.
item.name: Odd Keystone

item.description: When held by a Pokemon, the Pokemon will float into the air. When the holder is attacked, this item will burst.
item.name: Air Balloon

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It casts a tricky glare that lowers the opponent's accuracy.
item.name: BrightPowder

item.description: A mysterious evolutionary lump. When held, it raises the Defense and Sp. Def of a Pokemon that can still evolve.
item.name: Eviolite

item.description: A very light stone. It reduces the weight of a Pokemon when held.
item.name: Float Stone

item.description: A long, thin, bright-red string to be held by a Pokemon. If the holder becomes infatuated, the foe does too.
item.name: Destiny Knot

item.description: If the holder of this item takes damage, the attacker will also be damaged upon contact.
item.name: Rocky Helmet

item.description: If the holder is hit by an attack, it will switch with another Pokemon in your party.
item.name: Eject Button

item.description: A card with a mysterious power. When the holder is struck by a foe, the attacker is removed from battle.
item.name: Red Card

item.description: A tough, discarded carapace to be held by a Pokemon. It enables the holder to switch with a waiting Pokemon in battle.
item.name: Shed Shell

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It enables the holder to flee from any wild Pokemon without fail.
item.name: Smoke Ball

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is an egg filled with happiness that earns extra Exp. Points in battle.
item.name: Lucky Egg

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. The holder gets a share of a battle's Exp. Points without battling.
item.name: Exp. Share

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It doubles a battle's prize money if the holding Pokemon joins in.
item.name: Amulet Coin

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a bell with a comforting chime that calms the holder and makes it friendly.
item.name: Soothe Bell

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It helps keep wild Pokemon away if the holder is the first one in the party.
item.name: Cleanse Tag

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. This headband ups Attack, but allows the use of only one of its moves.
item.name: Choice Band

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. These distinctive glasses boost Sp. Atk, but allow the use of only one of its moves.
item.name: Choice Specs

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. This scarf boosts Speed, but allows the use of only one of its moves.
item.name: Choice Scarf

item.description: A Pokemon held item that extends the duration of the move Sunny Day used by the holder.
item.name: Heat Rock

item.description: A Pokemon held item that extends the duration of the move Rain Dance used by the holder.
item.name: Damp Rock

item.description: A Pokemon held item that extends the duration of the move Sandstorm used by the holder.
item.name: Smooth Rock

item.description: A Pokemon held item that extends the duration of the move Hail used by the holder.
item.name: Icy Rock

item.description: A Pokemon held item that extends the duration of barrier moves like Light Screen and Reflect used by the holder.
item.name: Light Clay

item.description: A Pokemon held item that extends the duration of multiturn attacks like Bind and Wrap.
item.name: Grip Claw

item.description: A band that increases the power of binding moves when held.
item.name: Binding Band

item.description: A Pokemon held item that boosts the power of HP-stealing moves to let the holder recover more HP.
item.name: Big Root

item.description: A held item that gradually restores the HP of Poison-type Pokemon. It inflicts damage on all other types.
item.name: Black Sludge

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. The holder's HP is gradually restored during battle.
item.name: Leftovers

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. The holder's HP is restored a little every time it inflicts damage.
item.name: Shell Bell

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It snaps the holder out of infatuation. It can be used only once.
item.name: Mental Herb

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It restores any lowered stat in battle. It can be used only once.
item.name: White Herb

item.description: A single-use item to be held by a Pokemon. It allows the immediate use of a move that charges on the first turn.
item.name: Power Herb

item.description: A consumable bulb. If the holder is hit by a Water-type move, its Sp. Atk will rise.
item.name: Absorb Bulb

item.description: A consumable battery. If the holder is hit by an Electric-type move, its Attack will rise.
item.name: Cell Battery

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It boosts the power of moves, but at the cost of some HP on each hit.
item.name: Life Orb

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a well-worn belt that slightly boosts the power of supereffective moves.
item.name: Expert Belt

item.description: A Pokemon held item that boosts a move used consecutively. Its effect is reset if another move is used.
item.name: Metronome

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a headband that slightly boosts the power of physical moves.
item.name: Muscle Band

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a thick pair of glasses that slightly boosts the power of special moves.
item.name: Wise Glasses

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a sharply hooked claw that ups the holder's critical-hit ratio.
item.name: Razor Claw

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a lens that boosts the holder's critical-hit ratio.
item.name: Scope Lens

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a magnifying lens that slightly boosts the accuracy of moves.
item.name: Wide Lens

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. If the holder moves after its target, its accuracy will be boosted.
item.name: Zoom Lens

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. When the holder inflicts damage, the target may flinch.
item.name: King's Rock

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It may make foes and allies flinch when the holder inflicts damage.
item.name: Razor Fang

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is tremendously heavy and makes the holder move slower than usual.
item.name: Lagging Tail

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. A light, sharp claw that lets the bearer move first occasionally.
item.name: Quick Claw

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. The holder may endure a potential KO attack, leaving it with just 1 HP.
item.name: Focus Band

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. If it has full HP, the holder will endure one potential KO attack, leaving 1 HP.
item.name: Focus Sash

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a bizarre orb that inflicts a burn on the holder in battle.
item.name: Flame Orb

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a bizarre orb that badly poisons the holder in battle.
item.name: Toxic Orb

item.description: A held item that damages the holder on every turn. It may latch on to foes and allies that touch the holder.
item.name: Sticky Barb

item.description: A Pokemon held item that cuts Speed. It makes Flying-type and levitating holders susceptible to Ground moves.
item.name: Iron Ball

item.description: Moves that would otherwise have no effect will land on the Pokemon that holds it.
item.name: Ring Target

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a stiff and heavy brace that promotes strong growth but lowers Speed.
item.name: Macho Brace

item.description: A Pokemon held item that promotes HP gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.
item.name: Power Weight

item.description: A Pokemon held item that promotes Attack gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.
item.name: Power Bracer

item.description: A Pokemon held item that promotes Defense gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.
item.name: Power Belt

item.description: A Pokemon held item that promotes Sp. Atk gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.
item.name: Power Lens

item.description: A Pokemon held item that promotes Sp. Def gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.
item.name: Power Band

item.description: A Pokemon held item that promotes Speed gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.
item.name: Power Anklet

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. The tricky aroma of this incense may make attacks miss the holder.
item.name: Lax Incense

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is an exotic-smelling incense that makes the holder bloated and slow moving.
item.name: Full Incense

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It doubles a battle's prize money if the holding Pokemon joins in.
item.name: Luck Incense

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It helps keep wild Pokemon away if the holder is the first one in the party.
item.name: Pure Incense

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is incense with a curious aroma that boosts the power of Water-type moves.
item.name: Sea Incense

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is incense with a curious aroma that boosts the power of Water-type moves.
item.name: Wave Incense

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is an exotic-smelling incense that boosts the power of Grass-type moves.
item.name: Rose Incense

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is an exotic-smelling incense that boosts the power of Psychic-type moves.
item.name: Odd Incense

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is an exotic-smelling incense that boosts the power of Rock-type moves.
item.name: Rock Incense

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a combustible fuel that boosts the power of Fire-type moves.
item.name: Charcoal

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a teardrop-shaped gem that ups the power of Water-type moves.
item.name: Mystic Water

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a powerful magnet that boosts the power of Electric-type moves.
item.name: Magnet

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a seed imbued with life that ups the power of Grass-type moves.
item.name: Miracle Seed

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a piece of ice that repels heat and boosts Ice-type moves.
item.name: NeverMeltIce

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a belt that boosts determination and Fighting-type moves.
item.name: Black Belt

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a small, poisonous barb that ups the power of Poison-type moves.
item.name: Poison Barb

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a loose, silky sand that boosts the power of Ground-type moves.
item.name: Soft Sand

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a long, sharp beak that boosts the power of Flying-type moves.
item.name: Sharp Beak

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a spoon imbued with telekinetic power that boosts Psychic-type moves.
item.name: TwistedSpoon

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a shiny, silver powder that ups the power of Bug-type moves.
item.name: SilverPowder

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is an unbreakable stone that ups the power of Rock-type moves.
item.name: Hard Stone

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a sinister, eerie tag that boosts the power of Ghost-type moves.
item.name: Spell Tag

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a hard and sharp fang that ups the power of Dragon-type moves.
item.name: Dragon Fang

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a shady-looking pair of glasses that boosts Dark-type moves.
item.name: BlackGlasses

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a special metallic film that ups the power of Steel-type moves.
item.name: Metal Coat

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a sumptuous scarf that boosts the power of Normal-type moves.
item.name: Silk Scarf

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Fire-type moves.
item.name: Flame Plate

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Water-type moves.
item.name: Splash Plate

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Electric-type moves.
item.name: Zap Plate

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Grass-type moves.
item.name: Meadow Plate

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Ice-type moves.
item.name: Icicle Plate

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Fighting-type moves.
item.name: Fist Plate

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Poison-type moves.
item.name: Toxic Plate

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Ground-type moves.
item.name: Earth Plate

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Flying-type moves.
item.name: Sky Plate

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Psychic-type moves.
item.name: Mind Plate

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Bug-type moves.
item.name: Insect Plate

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Rock-type moves.
item.name: Stone Plate

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Ghost-type moves.
item.name: Spooky Plate

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Dragon-type moves.
item.name: Draco Plate

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Dark-type moves.
item.name: Dread Plate

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Steel-type moves.
item.name: Iron Plate

item.description: A gem with an essence of fire. When held, it strengthens the power of a Fire-type move only once.
item.name: Fire Gem

item.description: A gem with an essence of water. When held, it strengthens the power of a Water-type move only once.
item.name: Water Gem

item.description: A gem with an essence of electricity. When held, it strengthens the power of an Electric-type move only once.
item.name: Electric Gem

item.description: A gem with an essence of nature. When held, it strengthens the power of a Grass-type move only once.
item.name: Grass Gem

item.description: A gem with an essence of ice. When held, it strengthens the power of an Ice-type move only once.
item.name: Ice Gem

item.description: A gem with an essence of combat. When held, it strengthens the power of a Fighting-type move only once.
item.name: Fighting Gem

item.description: A gem with an essence of poison. When held, it strengthens the power of a Poison-type move only once.
item.name: Poison Gem

item.description: A gem with an essence of land. When held, it strengthens the power of a Ground-type move only once.
item.name: Ground Gem

item.description: A gem with an essence of air. When held, it strengthens the power of a Flying-type move only once.
item.name: Flying Gem

item.description: A gem with an essence of the mind. When held, it strengthens the power of a Psychic-type move only once.
item.name: Psychic Gem

item.description: A gem with an insect-like essence. When held, it strengthens the power of a Bug-type move only once.
item.name: Bug Gem

item.description: A gem with an essence of rock. When held, it strengthens the power of a Rock-type move only once.
item.name: Rock Gem

item.description: A gem with a spectral essence. When held, it strengthens the power of a Ghost-type move only once.
item.name: Ghost Gem

item.description: A gem with a draconic essence. When held, it strengthens the power of a Dragon-type move only once.
item.name: Dragon Gem

item.description: A gem with an essence of darkness. When held, it strengthens the power of a Dark-type move only once.
item.name: Dark Gem

item.description: A gem with an essence of steel. When held, it strengthens the power of a Steel-type move only once.
item.name: Steel Gem

item.description: A gem with an ordinary essence. When held, it strengthens the power of a Normal-type move only once.
item.name: Normal Gem

item.description: An item to be held by Pikachu. It is a puzzling orb that raises the Attack and Sp. Atk stat.
item.name: Light Ball

item.description: An item to be held by Chansey. It is a pair of gloves that boosts Chansey's critical-hit ratio.
item.name: Lucky Punch

item.description: An item to be held by Ditto. Extremely fine yet hard, this odd powder boosts the Defense stat.
item.name: Metal Powder

item.description: An item to be held by Ditto. Extremely fine yet hard, this odd powder boosts the Speed stat.
item.name: Quick Powder

item.description: An item to be held by Cubone or Marowak. It is a hard bone of some sort that boosts the Attack stat.
item.name: Thick Club

item.description: An item to be held by Farfetch'd. It is a very long and stiff stalk of leek that boosts the critical-hit ratio.
item.name: Stick

item.description: A wondrous orb to be held by Latios or Latias. It raises both the Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.
item.name: Soul Dew

item.description: An item to be held by Clamperl. A fang that gleams a sharp silver, it raises the Sp. Atk stat.
item.name: DeepSeaTooth

item.description: An item to be held by Clamperl. A scale that shines a faint pink, it raises the Sp. Def stat.
item.name: DeepSeaScale

item.description: A brightly gleaming orb to be held by Dialga. It boosts the power of Dragon- and Steel-type moves.
item.name: Adamant Orb

item.description: A beautifully glowing orb to be held by Palkia. It boosts the power of Dragon- and Water-type moves.
item.name: Lustrous Orb

item.description: A glowing orb to be held by Giratina. It boosts the power of Dragon- and Ghost-type moves.
item.name: Griseous Orb

item.description: A cassette to be held by Genesect. It changes Techno Blast to a Water-type move.
item.name: Douse Drive

item.description: A cassette to be held by Genesect. It changes Techno Blast to an Electric-type move.
item.name: Shock Drive

item.description: A cassette to be held by Genesect. It changes Techno Blast to a Fire-type move.
item.name: Burn Drive

item.description: A cassette to be held by Genesect. It changes Techno Blast to an Ice-type move.
item.name: Chill Drive

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. The Pokemon holding this peculiar stone is prevented from evolving.
item.name: Everstone

item.description: A thick and tough scale. Dragon-type Pokemon may be holding this item when caught.
item.name: Dragon Scale

item.description: A transparent device filled with all sorts of data. It was produced by Silph Co.
item.name: Up-Grade

item.description: A transparent device overflowing with dubious data. Its producer is unknown.
item.name: Dubious Disc

item.description: A protective item of some sort. It is extremely stiff and heavy. It is loved by a certain Pokemon.
item.name: Protector

item.description: A box packed with a tremendous amount of electric energy. It is loved by a certain Pokemon.
item.name: Electirizer

item.description: A box packed with a tremendous amount of magma energy. It is loved by a certain Pokemon.
item.name: Magmarizer

item.description: A cloth imbued with horrifyingly strong spiritual energy. It is loved by a certain Pokemon.
item.name: Reaper Cloth

item.description: A mysterious scale that evolves certain Pokemon. It shines in rainbow colors.
item.name: Prism Scale

item.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokemon evolve. It is shaped like an egg.
item.name: Oval Stone

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It boosts the Cool aspect of the holder in a Contest.
item.name: Red Scarf

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It boosts the Beauty aspect of the holder in a Contest.
item.name: Blue Scarf

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It boosts the Cute aspect of the holder in a Contest.
item.name: Pink Scarf

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It boosts the Smart aspect of the holder in a Contest.
item.name: Green Scarf

item.description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It boosts the Tough aspect of the holder in a Contest.
item.name: Yellow Scarf

item.description: A spray-type medicine for wounds. It restores the HP of one Pokemon by just 20 points.
item.name: Potion

item.description: A spray-type medicine for wounds. It restores the HP of one Pokemon by 50 points.
item.name: Super Potion

item.description: A spray-type medicine for wounds. It restores the HP of one Pokemon by 200 points.
item.name: Hyper Potion

item.description: A spray-type medicine for wounds. It completely restores the HP of a single Pokemon.
item.name: Max Potion

item.description: A medicine that fully restores the HP and heals any status problems of a single Pokemon.
item.name: Full Restore

item.description: It revives all fainted Pokemon. In doing so, it also fully restores their HP.
item.name: Sacred Ash

item.description: A spray-type medicine. It awakens a Pokemon from the clutches of sleep.
item.name: Awakening

item.description: A spray-type medicine. It lifts the effect of poison from one Pokemon.
item.name: Antidote

item.description: A spray-type medicine. It heals a single Pokemon that is suffering from a burn.
item.name: Burn Heal

item.description: A spray-type medicine. It eliminates paralysis from a single Pokemon.
item.name: Parlyz Heal

item.description: A spray-type medicine. It defrosts a Pokemon that has been frozen solid.
item.name: Ice Heal

item.description: A spray-type medicine. It heals all the status problems of a single Pokemon.
item.name: Full Heal

item.description: Lavaridge Town's local specialty. It heals all the status problems of one Pokemon.
item.name: Lava Cookie

item.description: Old Chateau's hidden specialty. It heals all the status problems of a single Pokemon.
item.name: Old Gateau

item.description: Castelia City's specialty, soft-serve ice cream. It heals all the status problems of a single Pokemon.
item.name: Casteliacone

item.description: A medicine that revives a fainted Pokemon. It restores half the Pokemon's maximum HP.
item.name: Revive

item.description: A medicine that revives a fainted Pokemon. It fully restores the Pokemon's HP.
item.name: Max Revive

item.description: A 100% pure juice made of Berries. It restores the HP of one Pokemon by just 20 points.
item.name: Berry Juice

item.description: A famous Mahogany Town candy tourists like to buy and take home. It restores the HP of one Pokemon by 20 points.
item.name: RageCandyBar

item.description: Very sweet chocolate. It restores the HP of one Pokemon by only 20 points.
item.name: Sweet Heart

item.description: Water with a high mineral content. It restores the HP of one Pokemon by 50 points.
item.name: Fresh Water

item.description: A fizzy soda drink. It restores the HP of one Pokemon by 60 points.
item.name: Soda Pop

item.description: A very sweet drink. It restores the HP of one Pokemon by 80 points.
item.name: Lemonade

item.description: Milk with a very high nutrition content. It restores the HP of one Pokemon by 100 points.
item.name: Moomoo Milk

item.description: A very bitter medicine powder. It restores the HP of one Pokemon by 50 points.
item.name: EnergyPowder

item.description: A very bitter root. It restores the HP of one Pokemon by 200 points.
item.name: Energy Root

item.description: A very bitter medicine powder. It heals all the status problems of a single Pokemon.
item.name: Heal Powder

item.description: A very bitter medicinal herb. It revives a fainted Pokemon, fully restoring its HP.
item.name: Revival Herb

item.description: It restores the PP of a Pokemon's selected move by a maximum of 10 points.
item.name: Ether

item.description: It fully restores the PP of a single selected move that has been learned by the target Pokemon.
item.name: Max Ether

item.description: It restores the PP of all the moves learned by the targeted Pokemon by 10 points each.
item.name: Elixir

item.description: It fully restores the PP of all the moves learned by the targeted Pokemon.
item.name: Max Elixir

item.description: It slightly raises the maximum PP of a selected move that has been learned by the target Pokemon.
item.name: PP Up

item.description: It maximally raises the top PP of a selected move that has been learned by the target Pokemon.
item.name: PP Max

item.description: A nutritious drink for Pokemon. It raises the base HP of a single Pokemon.
item.name: HP Up

item.description: A nutritious drink for Pokemon. It raises the base Attack stat of a single Pokemon.
item.name: Protein

item.description: A nutritious drink for Pokemon. It raises the base Defense stat of a single Pokemon.
item.name: Iron

item.description: A nutritious drink for Pokemon. It raises the base Sp. Atk (Special Attack) stat of a single Pokemon.
item.name: Calcium

item.description: A nutritious drink for Pokemon. It raises the base Sp. Def (Special Defense) stat of a single Pokemon.
item.name: Zinc

item.description: A nutritious drink for Pokemon. It raises the base Speed stat of a single Pokemon.
item.name: Carbos

item.description: An item for use on a Pokemon. It slightly increases the base HP of a single Pokemon.
item.name: Health Wing

item.description: An item for use on a Pokemon. It slightly increases the base Attack stat of a single Pokemon.
item.name: Muscle Wing

item.description: An item for use on a Pokemon. It slightly increases the base Defense stat of a single Pokemon.
item.name: Resist Wing

item.description: An item for use on a Pokemon. It slightly increases the base Sp. Atk stat of a single Pokemon.
item.name: Genius Wing

item.description: An item for use on a Pokemon. It slightly increases the base Sp. Def stat of a single Pokemon.
item.name: Clever Wing

item.description: An item for use on a Pokemon. It slightly increases the base Speed stat of a single Pokemon.
item.name: Swift Wing

item.description: A candy that is packed with energy. It raises the level of a single Pokemon by one.
item.name: Rare Candy

item.description: The best Ball with the ultimate level of performance. It will catch any wild Pokemon without fail.
item.name: Master Ball

item.description: An ultra-performance Ball that provides a higher Pokemon catch rate than a Great Ball.
item.name: Ultra Ball

item.description: A good, high-performance Ball that provides a higher Pokemon catch rate than a standard Poke Ball.
item.name: Great Ball

item.description: A device for catching wild Pokemon. It is thrown line a ball at the target. It is designed as a capsule system.
item.name: Poke Ball

item.description: A special Poke Ball that is used only in the Great Marsh. It is decorated in a camouflage pattern.
item.name: Safari Ball

item.description: A special Poke Ball for the Bug-Catching Contest.
item.name: Sport Ball

item.description: A somewhat different Poke Ball that works especially well on Water- and Bug-type Pokemon.
item.name: Net Ball

item.description: A somewhat different Poke Ball that works especially well on Pokemon that underwater.
item.name: Dive Ball

item.description: A somewhat different Poke Ball that works especially well on weaker Pokemon in the wild.
item.name: Nest Ball

item.description: A somewhat different Poke Ball that works especially well on Pokemon species that were previously caught.
item.name: Repeat Ball

item.description: A somewhat different Ball that becomes progressively better the more turns there are in a battle.
item.name: Timer Ball

item.description: A comfortable Poke Ball that makes a caught wild Pokemon quickly grow friendly.
item.name: Luxury Ball

item.description: A somewhat rare Poke Ball that has been specially made to commemorate an event of some sort.
item.name: Premier Ball

item.description: A somewhat different Poke Ball that makes it easier to catch wild Pokemon at night or in dark places like caves.
item.name: Dusk Ball

item.description: A remedial Poke Ball that restores the caught Pokemon's HP and eliminates any status problem.
item.name: Heal Ball

item.description: A somewhat different Poke Ball that provides a better catch rate if it is used at the start of a wild encounter.
item.name: Quick Ball

item.description: A quite rare Poke Ball that has been specially crafted to commemorate an occasion of some sort.
item.name: Cherish Ball

item.description: A Poke Ball that makes it easier to catch Pokemon which are quick to run away.
item.name: Fast Ball

item.description: A Poke Ball for catching Pokemon that are a lower level than your own.
item.name: Level Ball

item.description: A Poke Ball for catching Pokemon hooked by a Rod when fishing.
item.name: Lure Ball

item.description: A Poke Ball for catching very heavy Pokemon.
item.name: Heavy Ball

item.description: A Poke Ball for catching Pokemon that are the opposite gender of your Pokemon.
item.name: Love Ball

item.description: A Poke Ball that makes caught Pokemon more friendly.
item.name: Friend Ball

item.description: A Poke Ball for catching Pokemon that evolve using the Moon Stone.
item.name: Moon Ball

item.description: The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat and accuracy.
item.name: TM01

item.description: The user slashes the target with huge, sharp claws.
item.name: TM02

item.description: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.
item.name: TM03

item.description: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.
item.name: TM04

item.description: The target is scared off and replaced by another Pokemon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.
item.name: TM05

item.description: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
item.name: TM06

item.description: Summons a hailstorm that lasts for five turns. The hailstorm damages all types except Ice.
item.name: TM07

item.description: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, boosting both its Attack and Defense stats.
item.name: TM08

item.description: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. Its power is doubled if the target is poisoned.
item.name: TM09

item.description: A unique attack that varies in type and intensity depending on the Pokemon using it.
item.name: TM10

item.description: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves.
item.name: TM11

item.description: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.
item.name: TM12

item.description: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. It may also freeze the target solid.
item.name: TM13

item.description: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike the opposing team. It may also freeze them solid.
item.name: TM14

item.description: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user must rest on the next turn to regain its energy.
item.name: TM15

item.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from special attacks for five turns.
item.name: TM16

item.description: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
item.name: TM17

item.description: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type moves.
item.name: TM18

item.description: The user makes the target float with its psychic power. The target is easier to hit for three turns.
item.name: TM19

item.description: The user creates a protective field that prevents status problems for five turns.
item.name: TM20

item.description: A full-power attack that grows more powerful the less the user likes its Trainer.
item.name: TM21

item.description: A two-turn attack. The user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the second turn.
item.name: TM22

item.description: The user throws a stone or projectile to attack an opponent. A flying Pokemon will fall to the ground when it's hit.
item.name: TM23

item.description: A strong electric blast is loosed at the target. It may also leave the target with paralysis.
item.name: TM24

item.description: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.
item.name: TM25

item.description: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokemon around it.
item.name: TM26

item.description: A full-power attack that grows more powerful the more the user likes its Trainer.
item.name: TM27

item.description: The user burrows, then attacks on the second turn. It can also be used to exit dungeons.
item.name: TM28

item.description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. It may also reduce the target's Sp. Def stat.
item.name: TM29

item.description: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.
item.name: TM30

item.description: The user attacks with tough fists, etc. It can also break any barrier such as Light Screen and Reflect.
item.name: TM31

item.description: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.
item.name: TM32

item.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from physical attacks for five turns.
item.name: TM33

item.description: It swamps the area around the user with a giant sludge wave. It may also poison those hit.
item.name: TM34

item.description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.
item.name: TM35

item.description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. It may also poison the target.
item.name: TM36

item.description: A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all combatants except the Rock, Ground, and Steel types.
item.name: TM37

item.description: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.
item.name: TM38

item.description: Boulders are hurled at the target. It also lowers the target's Speed by preventing its movement.
item.name: TM39

item.description: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. The attack lands without fail.
item.name: TM40

item.description: The user torments and enrages the target, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.
item.name: TM41

item.description: An attack move that doubles its power if the user is poisoned, paralyzed, or has a burn.
item.name: TM42

item.description: The user cloaks itself with flame and attacks. Building up more power, it raises the user's Speed stat.
item.name: TM43

item.description: The user goes to sleep for two turns. It fully restores the user's HP and heals any status problem.
item.name: TM44

item.description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.
item.name: TM45

item.description: The user attacks and steals the target's held item simultaneously. It can't steal if the user holds an item.
item.name: TM46

item.description: The user attacks the target's legs swiftly, reducing the target's Speed stat.
item.name: TM47

item.description: The user attacks the target with a song. Others can join in the Round and make the attack do greater damage.
item.name: TM48

item.description: The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used every turn, it does greater damage.
item.name: TM49

item.description: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack's recoil sharply reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat.
item.name: TM50

item.description: The user teleports using a strange power and switches its place with one of its allies.
item.name: TM51

item.description: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def.
item.name: TM52

item.description: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def.
item.name: TM53

item.description: A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.
item.name: TM54

item.description: The user shoots boiling hot water at its target. It may also leave the target with a burn.
item.name: TM55

item.description: The user flings its held item at the target as an attack. Its power and effects depend on the item.
item.name: TM56

item.description: The user attacks with an electric charge. The user may use any remaining electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.
item.name: TM57

item.description: The user hurls the target into the air, then drops it on the second turn. The target cannot attack while in the air.
item.name: TM58

item.description: The user attacks the target with fire. If the target is holding a Berry, the Berry becomes burnt up and unusable.
item.name: TM59

item.description: The user suppresses the target and makes its move go last.
item.name: TM60

item.description: The user shoots a sinister, bluish-white flame at the target to inflict a burn.
item.name: TM61

item.description: The user nimbly strikes the target. If the user is not holding an item, this attack inflicts massive damage.
item.name: TM62

item.description: It prevents the target from using its held item. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.
item.name: TM63

item.description: The user explodes to inflict damage on those around it. The user faints upon using this move.
item.name: TM64

item.description: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. It has a high critical-hit ratio.
item.name: TM65

item.description: The user stores power, then attacks. If the user can use this attack after the target, its power is doubled.
item.name: TM66

item.description: The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally fainted in the previous turn, this attack's damage increases.
item.name: TM67

item.description: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user must rest on the next turn.
item.name: TM68

item.description: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. It sharply raises the Speed stat.
item.name: TM69

item.description: The user flashes a bright light that cuts the target's accuracy. It can also be used to illuminate caves.
item.name: TM70

item.description: The user stabs the foe with sharpened stones from below. It has a high critical-hit ratio.
item.name: TM71

item.description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokemon in waiting.
item.name: TM72

item.description: A weak electric charge is launched at the target. It causes paralysis if it hits.
item.name: TM73

item.description: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the greater the damage.
item.name: TM74

item.description: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. It sharply raises the user's Attack stat.
item.name: TM75

item.description: Resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokemon. The targets' Sp. Atk stat is reduced.
item.name: TM76

item.description: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the target.
item.name: TM77

item.description: The user stomps down on the ground and attacks everything in the area. The targets' Speed stat is reduced.
item.name: TM78

item.description: The user blows a cold breath on the target. This attack always results in a critical hit.
item.name: TM79

item.description: Large boulders are hurled at the opposing team to inflict damage. They may also make the targets flinch.
item.name: TM80

item.description: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.
item.name: TM81

item.description: The user knocks away the target and drags out another Pokemon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.
item.name: TM82

item.description: The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk stats increase.
item.name: TM83

item.description: The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. It may also poison the target.
item.name: TM84

item.description: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal the user's HP.
item.name: TM85

item.description: The user snares the target with grass and trips it. The heavier the target, the greater the damage.
item.name: TM86

item.description: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, it also sharply raises the target's Attack stat.
item.name: TM87

item.description: The user pecks the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user plucks it and gains its effect.
item.name: TM88

item.description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokemon in waiting.
item.name: TM89

item.description: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user's decoy.
item.name: TM90

item.description: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.
item.name: TM91

item.description: The user creates a bizarre space in which slower Pokemon get to move first for five turns.
item.name: TM92

item.description: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into its target. It also damages the user a little.
item.name: TM93

item.description: The user attacks with a punch that can shatter a rock. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.
item.name: TM94

item.description: The user yells as if it is ranting about something, making the target's Sp. Atk stat decrease.
item.name: TM95

item.description: The target is cut with a scythe or claw. It can also be used to cut down thin trees.
item.name: HM01

item.description: The user soars, then strikes on the second turn. It can also be used to fly to any familiar town.
item.name: HM02

item.description: It swamps the area around the user with a giant wave. It can also be used for crossing water.
item.name: HM03

item.description: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power. This move can also be used to move boulders.
item.name: HM04

item.description: The user charges the target at an awesome speed. It can also be used to climb a waterfall.
item.name: HM05

item.description: Diving on the first turn, the user floats up and attacks on the second. It can be used for diving in the ocean.
item.name: HM06

item.description: It may be used or held by a Pokemon to recover from paralysis.
item.name: Cheri Berry

item.description: It may be used or held by a Pokemon to recover from sleep.
item.name: Chesto Berry

item.description: It may be used or held by a Pokemon to recover from poison.
item.name: Pecha Berry

item.description: It may be used or held by a Pokemon to recover from a burn.
item.name: Rawst Berry

item.description: It may be used or held by a Pokemon to defrost it.
item.name: Aspear Berry

item.description: It may be used or held by a Pokemon to restore a move's PP by 10.
item.name: Leppa Berry

item.description: It may be used or held by a Pokemon to heal the user by just 10 HP.
item.name: Oran Berry

item.description: It may be used or held by a Pokemon to recover from confusion.
item.name: Persim Berry

item.description: It may be used or held by a Pokemon to recover from any status problem.
item.name: Lum Berry

item.description: It may be used or held by a Pokemon to heal the user's HP a little.
item.name: Sitrus Berry

item.description: If held by a Pokemon, it restores the user's HP in a pinch, but will cause confusion if it hates the taste.
item.name: Figy Berry

item.description: If held by a Pokemon, it restores the user's HP in a pinch, but will cause confusion if it hates the taste.
item.name: Wiki Berry

item.description: If held by a Pokemon, it restores the user's HP in a pinch, but will cause confusion if it hates the taste.
item.name: Mago Berry

item.description: If held by a Pokemon, it restores the user's HP in a pinch, but will cause confusion if it hates the taste.
item.name: Aguav Berry

item.description: If held by a Pokemon, it restores the user's HP in a pinch, but will cause confusion if it hates the taste.
item.name: Iapapa Berry

item.description: In the Sinnoh region, they like to make sweets known as Poffins with this Berry and feed them to their Pokemon.
item.name: Razz Berry

item.description: In the Sinnoh region, they like to make sweets known as Poffins with this Berry and feed them to their Pokemon.
item.name: Bluk Berry

item.description: In the Sinnoh region, they like to make sweets known as Poffins with this Berry and feed them to their Pokemon.
item.name: Nanab Berry

item.description: In the Sinnoh region, they like to make sweets known as Poffins with this Berry and feed them to their Pokemon.
item.name: Wepear Berry

item.description: In the Sinnoh region, they like to make sweets known as Poffins with this Berry and feed them to their Pokemon.
item.name: Pinap Berry

item.description: Using it on a Pokemon makes it more friendly, but it also lowers its base HP.
item.name: Pomeg Berry

item.description: Using it on a Pokemon makes it more friendly, but it also lowers its base Attack stat.
item.name: Kelpsy Berry

item.description: Using it on a Pokemon makes it more friendly, but it also lowers its base Defense stat.
item.name: Qualot Berry

item.description: Using it on a Pokemon makes it more friendly, but it also lowers its base Sp. Atk stat.
item.name: Hondew Berry

item.description: Using it on a Pokemon makes it more friendly, but it also lowers its base Sp. Def stat.
item.name: Grepa Berry

item.description: Using it on a Pokemon makes it more friendly, but it also lowers its base Speed stat.
item.name: Tamato Berry

item.description: In the Sinnoh region, they like to make sweets known as Poffins with this Berry and feed them to their Pokemon.
item.name: Cornn Berry

item.description: In the Sinnoh region, they like to make sweets known as Poffins with this Berry and feed them to their Pokemon.
item.name: Magost Berry

item.description: In the Sinnoh region, they like to make sweets known as Poffins with this Berry and feed them to their Pokemon.
item.name: Rabuta Berry

item.description: In the Sinnoh region, they like to make sweets known as Poffins with this Berry and feed them to their Pokemon.
item.name: Nomel Berry

item.description: In the Sinnoh region, they like to make sweets known as Poffins with this Berry and feed them to their Pokemon.
item.name: Spelon Berry

item.description: In the Sinnoh region, they like to make sweets known as Poffins with this Berry and feed them to their Pokemon.
item.name: Pamtre Berry

item.description: In the Sinnoh region, they like to make sweets known as Poffins with this Berry and feed them to their Pokemon.
item.name: Watmel Berry

item.description: In the Sinnoh region, they like to make sweets known as Poffins with this Berry and feed them to their Pokemon.
item.name: Durin Berry

item.description: In the Sinnoh region, they like to make sweets known as Poffins with this Berry and feed them to their Pokemon.
item.name: Belue Berry

item.description: Weakens a supereffective Fire-type attack against the holding Pokemon.
item.name: Occa Berry

item.description: Weakens a supereffective Water-type attack against the holding Pokemon.
item.name: Passho Berry

item.description: Weakens a supereffective Electric-type attack against the holding Pokemon.
item.name: Wacan Berry

item.description: Weakens a supereffective Grass-type attack against the holding Pokemon.
item.name: Rindo Berry

item.description: Weakens a supereffective Ice-type attack against the holding Pokemon.
item.name: Yache Berry

item.description: Weakens a supereffective Fighting-type attack against the holding Pokemon.
item.name: Chople Berry

item.description: Weakens a supereffective Poison-type attack against the holding Pokemon.
item.name: Kebia Berry

item.description: Weakens a supereffective Ground-type attack against the holding Pokemon.
item.name: Shuca Berry

item.description: Weakens a supereffective Flying-type attack against the holding Pokemon.
item.name: Coba Berry

item.description: Weakens a supereffective Psychic-type attack against the holding Pokemon.
item.name: Payapa Berry

item.description: Weakens a supereffective Bug-type attack against the holding Pokemon.
item.name: Tanga Berry

item.description: Weakens a supereffective Rock-type attack against the holding Pokemon.
item.name: Charti Berry

item.description: Weakens a supereffective Ghost-type attack against the holding Pokemon.
item.name: Kasib Berry

item.description: Weakens a supereffective Dragon-type attack against the holding Pokemon.
item.name: Haban Berry

item.description: Weakens a supereffective Dark-type attack against the holding Pokemon.
item.name: Colbur Berry

item.description: Weakens a supereffective Steel-type attack against the holding Pokemon.
item.name: Babiri Berry

item.description: Weakens a Normal-type attack against the Pokemon holding this berry.
item.name: Chilan Berry

item.description: If held by a Pokemon, it raises its Attack stat in a pinch.
item.name: Liechi Berry

item.description: If held by a Pokemon, it raises its Defense stat in a pinch.
item.name: Ganlon Berry

item.description: If held by a Pokemon, it raises its Speed stat in a pinch.
item.name: Salac Berry

item.description: If held by a Pokemon, it raises its Sp. Atk stat in a pinch.
item.name: Petaya Berry

item.description: If held by a Pokemon, it raises its Sp. Def stat in a pinch.
item.name: Apicot Berry

item.description: If held by a Pokemon, it raises its critical-hit ratio in a pinch.
item.name: Lansat Berry

item.description: If held by a Pokemon, it sharply raises one of its stats in a pinch.
item.name: Starf Berry

item.description: If held by a Pokemon, it restores its HP if it is hit by any supereffective attack.
item.name: Enigma Berry

item.description: If held by a Pokemon, it raises the accuracy of a move just once in a pinch.
item.name: Micle Berry

item.description: If held by a Pokemon, it gets to move first just once in a pinch.
item.name: Custap Berry

item.description: If held by a Pokemon and a physical attack lands, the attacker also takes damage.
item.name: Jaboca Berry

item.description: If held by a Pokemon and a special attack lands, the attacker also takes damage.
item.name: Rowap Berry

item.description: Stationery featuring a print of a refreshingly green field. Let a Pokemon hold it for delivery.
item.name: Grass Mail

item.description: Stationery featuring a print of flames in blazing red. Let a Pokemon hold it for delivery.
item.name: Flame Mail

item.description: Stationery featuring a print of a blue world underwater. Let a Pokemon hold it for delivery.
item.name: Bubble Mail

item.description: Stationery featuring a print of pretty floral patterns. Let a Pokemon hold it for delivery.
item.name: Bloom Mail

item.description: Stationery featuring a print of a dimly lit coal mine. Let a Pokemon hold it for delivery.
item.name: Tunnel Mail

item.description: Stationery featuring a print of cool mechanical designs. Let a Pokemon hold it for delivery.
item.name: Steel Mail

item.description: Stationery featuring a print of giant heart patterns. Let a Pokemon hold it for delivery.
item.name: Heart Mail

item.description: Stationery featuring a print of a chilly, snow-covered world. Let a Pokemon hold it for delivery.
item.name: Snow Mail

item.description: Stationery featuring a print depicting the huge expanse of space. Let a Pokemon hold it for delivery.
item.name: Space Mail

item.description: Stationery featuring a print of colorful letter sets. Let a Pokemon hold it for delivery.
item.name: Air Mail

item.description: Stationery featuring a print of a vivid rainbow pattern. Let a Pokemon hold it for delivery.
item.name: Mosaic Mail

item.description: Stationery featuring a print of a tough-looking brick pattern. Let a Pokemon hold it for delivery.
item.name: Brick Mail

item.description: An item that raises the Attack stat of a Pokemon in battle. It wears off if the Pokemon is withdrawn.
item.name: X Attack

item.description: It sharply raises the Attack stat of a Pokemon in battle. It wears off if the Pokemon is withdrawn.
item.name: X Attack 2

item.description: It drastically raises the Attack stat of a Pokemon in battle. It wears off if the Pokemon is withdrawn.
item.name: X Attack 3

item.description: It raises the Attack stat of a Pokemon in battle immensely. It wears off if the Pokemon is withdrawn.
item.name: X Attack 6

item.description: An item that raises the Defense of a Pokemon in battle. It wears off if the Pokemon is withdrawn.
item.name: X Defend

item.description: It sharply raises the Defense stat of a Pokemon in battle. It wears off if the Pokemon is withdrawn.
item.name: X Defend 2

item.description: It drastically raises the Defense stat of a Pokemon in battle. It wears off if the Pokemon is withdrawn.
item.name: X Defend 3

item.description: It raises the Defense stat of a Pokemon in battle immensely. It wears off if the Pokemon is withdrawn.
item.name: X Defend 6

item.description: An item that raises the Sp. Atk stat of a Pokemon in battle. It wears off if the Pokemon is withdrawn.
item.name: X Special

item.description: It sharply raises the Sp. Atk stat of a Pokemon in battle. It wears off if the Pokemon is withdrawn.
item.name: X Special 2

item.description: It drastically raises the Sp. Atk stat of a Pokemon in battle. It wears off if the Pokemon is withdrawn.
item.name: X Special 3

item.description: It raises the Sp. Atk stat of a Pokemon in battle immensely. It wears off if the Pokemon is withdrawn.
item.name: X Special 6

item.description: An item that raises the Sp. Def stat of a Pokemon in battle. It wears off if the Pokemon is withdrawn.
item.name: X Sp. Def

item.description: It sharply raises the Sp. Def stat of a Pokemon in battle. It wears off if the Pokemon is withdrawn.
item.name: X Sp. Def 2

item.description: It drastically raises the Sp. Def stat of a Pokemon in battle. It wears off if the Pokemon is withdrawn.
item.name: X Sp. Def 3

item.description: It raises the Sp. Def stat of a Pokemon in battle immensely. It wears off if the Pokemon is withdrawn.
item.name: X Sp. Def 6

item.description: An item that raises the Speed stat of a Pokemon in battle. It wears off if the Pokemon is withdrawn.
item.name: X Speed

item.description: It sharply raises the Speed stat of a Pokemon in battle. It wears off if the Pokemon is withdrawn.
item.name: X Speed 2

item.description: It drastically raises the Speed stat of a Pokemon in battle. It wears off if the Pokemon is withdrawn.
item.name: X Speed 3

item.description: It raises the Speed stat of a Pokemon in battle immensely. It wears off if the Pokemon is withdrawn.
item.name: X Speed 6

item.description: An item that raises the accuracy of a Pokemon in battle. It wears off if the Pokemon is withdrawn.
item.name: X Accuracy

item.description: It sharply raises the accuracy of a Pokemon in battle. It wears off if the Pokemon is withdrawn.
item.name: X Accuracy 2

item.description: It drastically raises the accuracy of a Pokemon in battle. It wears off if the Pokemon is withdrawn.
item.name: X Accuracy 3

item.description: It raises the accuracy of a Pokemon in battle immensely. It wears off if the Pokemon is withdrawn.
item.name: X Accuracy 6

item.description: It raises the critical-hit ratio greatly. It can be used only once and wears off if the Pokemon is withdrawn.
item.name: Dire Hit

item.description: It can be used many times to raise the critical-hit ratio of one Pokemon. It wears off if the Pokemon is withdrawn.
item.name: Dire Hit 2

item.description: It can be used many times to greatly raise a Pokemon's critical-hit ratio. It wears off if the Pokemon is withdrawn.
item.name: Dire Hit 3

item.description: An item that prevents stat reduction among the Trainer's party Pokemon for five turns after use.
item.name: Guard Spec.

item.description: When used, it restores any stat changes of an ally Pokemon.
item.name: Reset Urge

item.description: When used, it activates the Ability of an ally Pokemon.
item.name: Ability Urge

item.description: When used, it causes an ally Pokemon to use its held item.
item.name: Item Urge

item.description: When used, it causes an ally Pokemon to drop a held item.
item.name: Item Drop

item.description: A blue flute made from blown glass. Its melody awakens a single Pokemon from sleep.
item.name: Blue Flute

item.description: A yellow flute made from blown glass. Its melody snaps a single Pokemon out of confusion.
item.name: Yellow Flute

item.description: A red flute made from blown glass. Its melody snaps a single Pokemon out of infatuation.
item.name: Red Flute

item.description: A doll that attracts Pokemon. Use it to flee from any battle with a wild Pokemon.
item.name: Poke Doll

item.description: An item that attracts Pokemon. Use it to flee from any battle with a wild Pokemon.
item.name: Fluffy Tail

item.description: An item that attracts Pokemon. Use it to flee from any battle with a wild Pokemon.
item.name: Poke Toy

item.description: A folding Bicycle that enables much faster movement than the Running Shoes.
item.name: Bicycle

item.description: An old and beat-up fishing rod. Use it by any body of water to fish for wild aquatic Pokemon.
item.name: Old Rod

item.description: A new, good-quality fishing rod. Use it by any body of water to fish for wild aquatic Pokemon.
item.name: Good Rod

item.description: An awesome, high-tech fishing rod. Use it by any body of water to fish for wild aquatic Pokemon.
item.name: Super Rod

item.description: A device used for finding items. If there is a hidden item nearby when it is used, it emits a signal.
item.name: Itemfinder

item.description: It checks for unseen items in the area and makes noise and lights when it finds something.
item.name: Dowsing MCHN

item.description: A tool that can search out Pokemon that are hiding in grass. Its battery is recharged as you walk.
item.name: Poke Radar

item.description: A very convenient map that can be viewed anytime. It even shows your present location.
item.name: Town Map

item.description: A flute that is said to instantly awaken any Pokemon. It has a lovely tone.
item.name: Poke Flute

item.description: A case for holding coins obtained at the Game Corner. It holds up to 50,000 coins.
item.name: Coin Case

item.description: A sack used to gather and hold volcanic ash.
item.name: Soot Sack

item.description: A scope that makes unseeable Pokemon visible. It is made by Silph Co.
item.name: Silph Scope

item.description: A device by Devon that signals any unseeable Pokemon.
item.name: Devon Scope

item.description: A bottle used for watering plants.
item.name: Squirtbottle

item.description: A watering can shaped like a Psyduck. It helps promote healthy growth of Berries planted in soft soil.
item.name: Sprayduck

item.description: A tool used for watering Berries and plants.
item.name: Wailmer Pail

item.description: A flower sometimes bundled in bouquets to convey gratitude on special occasions like birthdays.
item.name: Gracidea

item.description: A ticket required to board the ship to Doxy Island. It glows beautifully.
item.name: Aurora Ticket

item.description: A faded sea chart that shows the way to a certain island.
item.name: Old Sea Map

item.description: A splicer that fuses Kyurem and a certain Pokemon. They are said to have been one in the beginning.
item.name: DNA Splicers

item.description: A glass that reveals the truth. It is a mysterious glass that returns a Pokemon back to its original shape.
item.name: Reveal Glass

item.description: An oval charm said to increase the chance of Eggs being found at the Day Care.
item.name: Oval Charm

item.description: A shiny charm said to increase the chance of finding a Shiny Pokemon.
item.name: Shiny Charm
